subject: Add Gemini fallback nodes to workflow
description: Added 5 Gemini fallback nodes and wired connections. Reference: `workflows/llm_data_collection/CLAUDE.md:44` (architecture section). Verification: `mcp__n8n-mcp__n8n_update_partial_workflow` returned `operationsApplied: 15`, nodeCount increased from 30 to 35.
